keywords.name: keywords
keywords.description: Keywords are words or phrases that capture the main ideas, themes, concepts, or subjects of the text.

topics.name: topics
topics.description: Topics are the main ideas, themes, concepts, or subjects. Topics are often generalizations of the text and often do not appear as words in the document.

named_events.name: named events
named_events.description: Named events are specific occurrences or happenings at a particular time and place with associated unique name.

general_events.name: general events
general_events.description: General events are unnamed occurrences or happenings at a particular time and place (e.g. car crash, football match, border clash, awakening).

named_places.name: places
named_places.description: Named places are for example buildings, locations, areas, or regions with a distinct identity and name.

general_places.name: general places
general_places.description: General places are location types without a name (e.g. river, wilderness, city, underground, mountains).

named_people.name: named people
named_people.description: Named people are individuals who are mentioned by name in the text. Named people should be represented in the output by their full name if possible.

roles.name: roles
roles.description: Roles are the functions, positions, jobs, responsibilities or life roles of individuals or groups of people.

organizations.name: organizations
organizations.description: Organizations include states, companies, institutions, associations, and other groups of people with a common purpose or identity.

perpetrators.name: perpetrators
perpetrators.description: Perpetrators should include the exact words or phrases that identify the person or group of people who committed a crime, act of violence, or other harmful act.

victims.name: victims
victims.description: Victims should include the exact words or phrases that identify the person or group of people who were harmed by a crime, act of violence, or other harmful act.

5-range.name: 5-range
5-range.description: Number of paragraphs in the text.

options.name: 1-report
options.description: Report is information about a current event answering questions: who, what, where.

options.name: 2-extended_report
options.description: Report is information about a current event answering questions: who, what, where, when, how and why.

options.name: 3-interview
options.description: Interview is a conversation between two or more people.

8-message-trigger.name: 8-message-trigger
8-message-trigger.description: The message trigger is the event or situation that causes the message to be sent.

options.name: 1-politician
options.description: The message reacts on actions of a politician

options.name: 2-security-forces
options.description: The message reacts on action of security forces.

options.name: 4-public
options.description: The message reacts on action of public.

9-place.name: 9-place
9-place.description: The country where the event or situation occurs.

options.name: 1-czech-republic
options.description: The event or situation occurs in the Czech Republic.

options.name: 2-slovakia
options.description: The event or situation occurs in Slovakia.

options.name: 3-poland
options.description: The event or situation occurs in Poland.

options.name: 4-germany
options.description: The event or situation occurs in Germany.

options.name: 5-russia
options.description: The event or situation occurs in Russia.

options.name: 6-ukraine
options.description: The event or situation occurs in Ukraine.

options.name: 9-other
options.description: The event or situation occurs in other country.

options.name: 0-unknown
options.description: The event or situation occurs in unknown country.
